signals.problem_statement: The current email management system is inefficient for handling shared inboxes.
signals.customer_ask: Looking for something more efficient for a shared email.
signals.context: Small IT team managing support requests for a K-12 school.

signals.problem_statement: There is a need for better assignment and tracking of support tickets.
signals.customer_ask: Easier communication and assignment of tasks.
signals.context: Small IT team managing support requests for a K-12 school.

signals.problem_statement: The team lacks visibility into the performance and workload metrics of support requests.
signals.context: Small IT team managing support requests for a K-12 school.
